thread.title: Hello: #AdeleIsBack and nobody can contain their excitement
thread.title_full: Hello: #AdeleIsBack and nobody can contain their excitement

title: Hello: #AdeleIsBack and nobody can contain their excitement
text:
The 25 track list has been released in full: 
1. Hello 2. Send My Love (To Your New Lover) 3. I Miss You 4. When We Were Young 5. Remedy 6. Water Under the Bridge 7. River Lea 8. Love in the Dark 9. Million Years Ago 10. All I Ask 11. Sweetest Devotion 
This is her first album since 2011′s 21 – named after the age she was when she wrote it. Adele, now 27, seems to have followed this precedent – naming her new album 25. In a post on her website she explained: 
“I feel like I’ve spent my whole life so far wishing it away. Always wishing I was older, wishing I was somewhere else, wishing I could remember and wishing I could forget too … 
“My last record was a break-up record and if I had to label this one I would call it a make-up record. I’m making up with myself. Making up for lost time … Teetering on the edge of being an old adolescent and a fully-fledged adult, I made the decision to go into becoming who I’m going to be forever.” 
She added: “25 is about getting to know who I’ve become without realising. And I’m sorry it took so long, but you know, life happened.” Share article 
Adele’s new album 25 is out November 20. Promoted Stories
